frontmatter.title: Page
frontmatter.shortDescription: Used to build the layout of a page in the Shopify admin. A flexible container for composing pages consistently.
keywords: page without primary action in header

examples.title: Default
examples.description: Use for detail pages, which should have pagination and breadcrumbs, and also often have several actions.

examples.title: With custom primary action
examples.description: Use to create a custom primary action.

examples.title: Without primary action in header
examples.description: Use when a primary action functions better as part of the page content instead of in the page header.

examples.title: With destructive secondary action
examples.description: Used to visually indicate that the secondary page action is destructive.

examples.title: With custom secondary action
examples.description: Use to create a custom secondary action.

examples.title: With tooltip action
examples.description: Use when merchants or their staff will benefit from context on why a page action is disabled.

examples.title: With subtitle
examples.description: Use when the page title benefits from secondary content.

examples.title: With external link
examples.description: Use when a secondary action links to another website. Actions marked external open in a new browser tab.

examples.title: Without pagination
examples.description: Use when the page doesn’t represent a list of objects or a detail view for an object.

examples.title: Full-width
examples.description: Use for layouts that benefit from more screen width, such as wide tables or lists.

examples.title: Narrow width
examples.description: Use a narrow width layout if the page supports a single unified task. When merchants must review the entire page contents to complete their goal, this layout helps focus their attention in a single path from top to bottom.

examples.title: With action groups
examples.description: Use action groups for sets of actions that relate to one another, particularly when there are too many to display as secondary actions. Note that these groups will be further rolled up into a single action for smaller displays so that actions do not wrap or overflow the page bounds.

examples.title: With content after title
examples.description: Title metadata appears immediately after the page’s title. Use it to communicate brief, important and non-interactive status information about an entire page.

examples.title: Default
With custom primary action
Without primary action in header
With destructive secondary action
With custom secondary action
With tooltip action
With subtitle
With external link
Without pagination
Full-width
Narrow width
With action groups
With content after title

pageProps.seoDescription: Use to build the outer wrapper of a page, including the page title and associated actions.

PageProps.name: PageProps

members.name: children
members.description: The contents of the page

members.name: fullWidth
members.description: Remove the normal max-width on the page

members.name: narrowWidth
members.description: Decreases the maximum layout width. Intended for single-column layouts

members.name: titleHidden
members.description: Visually hide the title

members.name: filterActions
members.description: Enables filtering action list items

members.name: primaryAction
members.description: Primary page-level action

members.name: pagination
members.description: Page-level pagination

members.name: backAction
members.description: A back action link

members.name: secondaryActions
members.description: Collection of secondary page-level actions

members.name: actionGroups
members.description: Collection of page-level groups of secondary actions

members.name: onActionRollup
members.description: Callback that returns true when secondary actions are rolled up into action groups, and false when not

members.name: title
members.description: Page title, in large type

members.name: subtitle
members.description: Page subtitle, in regular type

members.name: titleMetadata
members.description: Important status information shown immediately after the title.

members.name: compactTitle
members.description: Removes spacing between title and subtitle

PaginationProps.name: PaginationProps

members.name: previousKeys
members.description: Keyboard shortcuts for the previous button

members.description: Tooltip for the next button

members.name: previousTooltip
members.description: Tooltip for the previous button

members.description: The URL of the next page

members.name: previousURL
members.description: The URL of the previous page

members.description: Whether there is a next page to show

members.name: hasPrevious
members.description: Whether there is a previous page to show

members.name: accessibilityLabel
members.description: Accessible label for the pagination

members.name: accessibilityLabels
members.description: Accessible labels for the buttons and UnstyledLinks

members.description: Callback when next button is clicked

members.name: onPrevious
members.description: Callback when previous button is clicked

members.name: label
members.description: Text to provide more context in between the arrow buttons

members.name: type
members.description: Layout structure of the component
